website_summaries.verdict: A comprehensive beginner's 162-piece set that boasts everything from pencils and paints to sketching/painting pads. An affordable choice for budget-conscious buyers seeking a value-packed set for budding artists.
pros: Well-organized, attractive wooden box is filled to the brim with a variety of art supplies
A generous supply of pencil crayons, watercolor paints, pastels, and crayons provides an opportunity for unlimited artistic experimentation and expression
Complete set has absolutely everything needed to get started
A great gift for beginners or older children
cons: More experienced artists are unlikely to be satisfied by the reduced richness of color and overall quality

customer_reviews.title: Came dirty
customer_reviews.text: The kit is ok. Not great quality supplies. But ok for the 8 year old I purchased for. When delivered the crayons had fallen all over the drawer and the drawer was jammed by them. They’re the cheap waxy crayon, the kind that don’t have any names of the colors. The wooden box has stains (water stains?) all over it. I will try and clean it up and gift it as is because I don’t have time to send it back. Definitely not worth $38 or the overnight shipping I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy. Can do better
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap art supplies pencils have very light color an doesn't even match the color it shows it to be paints look like something youd get at the Dollar Tree just over all a very cheap art set only thing nice is the sketch book an the wooden box...
customer_reviews.author: Cory Burgess`

customer_reviews.title: Features Listed Are Not Included
customer_reviews.text: Although the choices are vast, the crayons are junk and cheap. Anyone familiar with Crayola would toss these out immediately. Also the bottom drawer is not secured, even with the latches, so it falls out. There is no luggage style handle to carry the kit, as featured. Have not tried other items, but believe this is the biggest waste of money around. Even at the low price.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Milburn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful art set!
customer_reviews.text: At first my package got lost, later that day they found it and told me it was going to be one day late. It actually came right on time. The art set is just amazing, everything came as they said it would. The only thing that happened to it was, a few crayons were loose. Every thing else came perfect and nothing was broken, lost or damaged.
customer_reviews.author: McKenzie Powell

customer_reviews.title: case was extremely nice, everything has it's own place and due to ...
customer_reviews.text: case was extremely nice, everything has it's own place and due to that its very easy to see just by glancing if something is lost or misplaced. Having the notebooks for the different types of media was nice as well, it made it so I was able to use everything in the box without having to go out and purchase more items. would definitely recommend as a starter kit for someone interested in arts.
customer_reviews.author: Steph Hale

customer_reviews.title: Cheap wooden case
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the case is cheap and the crayons were all over the place. Not happy with it but decided to keep it anyway because I do like the sketch books and pencils that came with it. In the picture the wood is polished and looks great. What I got doesn't even look like it is the same color.
customer_reviews.author: Nyrshea Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good mix but crayons all mixed up.
customer_reviews.text: Nice setup. The only thing I didn't like is when I received it the crayons were all mixed up. I had a hard time even getting the tray out because the crayons were so mixed around. Once I got the tray out I cut a piece of cardboard to fit on top of the tray so the crayons would stay in place. If you by this for a gift, make sure you open it and put the crayons back in place. I suggest using a piece of cardboard to hold them in place. Not sure why the company doesn't do that.
customer_reviews.author: Michael McClintic

customer_reviews.title: ... nervous ordering this product after reading reviews but very glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous ordering this product after reading reviews but very glad I did. The crayons did not stay in place but did not break in transit. Maybe they should ship with a piece of heavy paper to protect them? It has a very nice selection of art supplies. Purchased as a gift for 10 year old. I think she will love it and have many hours of enjoyment with it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece
customer_reviews.text: I’m not gonna lie I was super nervous even attempting to buy this because of some of the reviews 🤣 thank God I took a chance cause this is a beyond beautiful set! My daughter is homeschooled, going into the 7th grade, and she wanted Art as her extra curricular this year. She’s in love and instantly drew up a picture. She loves the pencils, and can’t wait to try out the rest of it throughout the year. Comes in a gorgeous wooden box, and everything was intact and unbroken!
customer_reviews.author: Trish Yonts

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible item ordered it twice and both have the same problem. All the crowns had fallen out in the bottom drawer and the drawer would not even open. On the second reorder the front of the case was broken as well. Certainly not worth the time and effort I now have to put into it to return this item two times.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Miller

customer_reviews.title: Gift for granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year granddaughter thinks its great. But I think you can do better. The wood cabinet looks really good. Some good supplies included. BUT please notice, of the 162 pieces...a LARGE number of these are crayons. Just need to know that. I didnt notice it and bothers me so much of the "162 pieces" are crayons.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I’d recommend for any young aspiring artists or someone that enjoys to doodle. Great value but definitely not high end for profecionals, but good enough for anyone that enjoys making art.
customer_reviews.author: ak_mott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This art set is truly amazing. The price was awesome and it comes with everything one needs.
customer_reviews.author: inertia4

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great value.
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my granddaughter. I did sand the “drawer” edges lightly just to make sure she would not get any splinters. I engraved her name and year on top. She loved it! There is so much For her including sketch books. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: P.B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set!
customer_reviews.text: This is an impressive set! I gifted this to a pre-teen artist who was over the moon when she opened the package. The wooden storage box is a nice touch and I love that it came with sketch pads, watercolor paper, etc. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: PrissyPance

customer_reviews.title: Great gift. Drawer does not stay shut
customer_reviews.text: When we received this in the mail I had to fight to open the drawer with the crayons in it and put them in their holders. They moved all around in there and blocked me from opening the drawer easily. Also, the drawer does not have a latch or anything to keep it from opening. I gave this as a Christmas gift to my brother and I had to be sure not to tip it at all or we would have crayons everywhere. The top part is wonderful. Gives lots of pencils and paints. And I loved the books that came with it
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for my 8 yr. old grandchild, who is a budding artist. It was their favorite present. It beat out the toys! I want one for myself...so does my daughter!
customer_reviews.author: The miller's

customer_reviews.title: Secure the drawer!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my son’s birthday. I was excited because of the amount of things you get with this set. The day he unwrapped it the drawer flew out and all the crayons came out. No worries! I figured it was because he was excited. As he went to take it upstairs the drawer flew out again and hit the floor only this time the knob broke off. My suggestion would be to have a way to lock the drawer in the case. He ended up with a broken case and broken crayons.
customer_reviews.author: Mz

customer_reviews.title: Birthday Gift.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson seems to like it although he said it was bigger than the one he asked for. I'm fairly sure he wasn't complaining. I would have liked it when I was his age.
customer_reviews.author: DuffyDawg

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for any artist!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my niece for Christmas and she loves it! The box case it comes with us gorgeous, and the materials are perfect for true artists or beginners looking to explore multiple mediums. The only downside is that the crayons in the drawer got tossed around in transit so the drawer didn’t come out right away as some crayons got stuck; we broke a few trying to get them out. Otherwise, perfect for the value!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Velazquez

customer_reviews.title: Art Supplies
customer_reviews.text: These were really great gifts for promoting artistic abilities in young kids who want to become artist. It comes in a great case to keep things organized and has all the things they need. Great price as well.
customer_reviews.author: pappajack

customer_reviews.title: It arrived so fast!
customer_reviews.text: What the case didn't have is a handle, but otherwise it is a very fine box of art media. I'm using the brushes for my paint-by-numbers artwork.
customer_reviews.author: J. McQuitty

customer_reviews.title: For a nontoxic product it smells toxic
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a Christmas gift and my son was excited to open it but was unable to open the drawer. It was jammed with the crayons that popped out of the tray. It took me several minutes to unlodge the crayons and open the drawer. The wood case was nice, but everything had an awful smell that would make me nauseating.
customer_reviews.author: DKW

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material, broken parts
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my boyfriend. When it was delivered yesterday morning and I opened it up to set everything up and surprise him, I literally cried. One of the knobs had been broken off sometime before the product was even boxed up and i would have just fixed it myself but there wasn't a knob anywhere inside the packaging. For the money I spent on this item......the crayons are cheap pieces of crap and weren't even in the box where they were supposed to be. Its a good thing my boyfriend loved it and doesn't want to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: wikawldgrl25

customer_reviews.title: Great Find
customer_reviews.text: This was an awesome suggestion by my daughter. She expressed an interest in drawing and thought this would be ideal for her to express her creativity. I would recommend this for anyone who loves to draw or paint.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Lott

customer_reviews.title: Couldbe packaged better.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the box and the top setup with paints and colored pencils. I did not like the crayons at all and they were all out of the holders and the drawer was hard to open. I’ll be switching them out for a better quality crayon once My son opens it on Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: CDP2238

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: I am overall satisfied with the product, the only problem is that some of the crayons got damaged and broke in shipping. The crayons are in the lower drawer and got dislodged in shipping causing the lower drawer to jam and the crayons to get broken. If they find a way to hold the crayons in place during shipping it will be fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Joe Mc

customer_reviews.title: Definitely an amazing buy!
customer_reviews.text: My kids have sat for hours and colored, painted, drew and created! This was one of the best gifts we gave this year. The materials are so worth the money. The scetch books are amazing. We've done everything already with this and looks like it will last a long time. I recommend you buy this I give it a 5 stars in everyway!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Apple

customer_reviews.title: Nice beginner's set
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect condition (apart from a few loose crayons!) and looked great. For somebody who is just starting out or getting back into a lost hobby or vocation, this works. There are samples of most of what you'll need here, only lacking tubes of paint. From this standpoint, it makes a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Luke

customer_reviews.title: Great art set!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for a 9 year old who has been painting and drawing for fun. She really enjoys it. The box is excellent for storage and all the variety of supplies allows her to explore her creativity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap case with broken, jammed crayons upon delivery
customer_reviews.text: Wooden case but it is flimsy and cheaply made. The crayons are jammed and broken inside the bottom drawer upon delivery. There are no canvas books at all with the order but falsely advertised. I intended it as a Christmas gift but had to return it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Case is kind of junky and half the crayons were out of the drawer and several were broken
customer_reviews.text: My kids got this today and many crayons were broken and completely dislodged and jammed inside the back of the drawer. Not sure if this is from shipping or from the manufacturer. Its Disappointing considering it was over $40. It's pretty much a mess and they were disappointed. I will most likely ship back.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Sheley

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality art supplies. Paper was fine.
customer_reviews.text: The art supplies are very poor quality and cheap. The box is nice. Paper is obviously fine since they are just pads of paper. Should have been better quality art supplies. Would be ok for a young child who wouldn’t know the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel martin

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: This was gifted to my little sister who was so excited and her creativity and imagination spiked when she had so many artistic ways to express it.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Rogers

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP JUNK!
customer_reviews.text: Just horrible junk. I know it’s a kids art set but wow is the quality horrendous. I was so disappointed and embarrassed. I don’t know why amazon lets this kind of cheap junk on their site.
customer_reviews.author: DeSteveo

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Value
customer_reviews.text: Great product at a great price. Gave as a gift and was very pleased with the package and the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Ted G.

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter (11) for Christmas she loved it. Built to last this was a great deal for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Marlon Henderson

customer_reviews.title: A place for everything & everything in its place!
customer_reviews.text: The set comes in a beautiful varnished wooden box. All neat & organized with a slot for everything, except sketch, watercolor, & chalk pad. There is no room forpaint tray or brushes in box. I would advise getting a plastic box for the bruses to be stored in. Otherwise wonderful gift & item. I purchased for my 9 year old grandson's birthday, he's really into art. Enjoy!!!
customer_reviews.author: PAMELA

customer_reviews.title: Great variety of products packaged in easy to use, and easy to store boxes/cases.
customer_reviews.text: We have a budding artist amongst our grandchildren. She was so estatic to get her very own supplies for all sorts of projects
customer_reviews.author: Silver Fox 42

customer_reviews.title: Awesome art set
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift and it was much appreciated. She loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Shop2much

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for the creative mind.
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my granddaughter and grandson for Christmas. They share it. It's so thorough in all the appointments that it keeps them busy for hours. They simply loved it.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a 5-year-old budding artist, and his mom told me he uses it everyday. He felt so grown up having such an impressive art kit. Worth the money, absolutely!
customer_reviews.author: JLR

customer_reviews.title: Great items
customer_reviews.text: The items are great but please do not use USPS! They left it in a huge puddle while it was raining! The amazon deliveryman for another purchase went & placed the other item in a safe spot where it wouldnt get wet. Please stop using USPS!
customer_reviews.author: Elvira

customer_reviews.title: That I love ordering items from you all but presentation is everything
customer_reviews.text: When I got the package it was chipped and partially open! It was too late to complain because it was for my son on his birthday and he lives out of town. So I just kept it. But I was highly upset about the presentation
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Searcy

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Great for my 14 year-old daughter who loves art and excels in school. Has a lot of needed supplies she can use.
customer_reviews.author: Stryker

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old daughter LOVED this! She used everything and requested another one for next Xmas!
customer_reviews.author: Shiann

customer_reviews.title: Great set for beginners and beyond
customer_reviews.text: Great art set with so many different mediums to play with. For a budding artist, this is a kit that will last a long time, in a beautiful wood case.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie9256

customer_reviews.title: Quality is meh but ok for starter artists like a kid.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the things in the box was ok and the sketch books were kinda crap I guess I was expecting better quality stuff but I’m just not like the paper or the color palette of the water color.

customer_reviews.title: Mygranddaughter lived this. Gift
customer_reviews.text: The crayons do move in the kit durin g shipping. Just take a moment. They were fine

customer_reviews.title: Very nice gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas present for my grandson. He's nine years old and just beginning to show an avid interest in art, particularly comic book illustration. I'm an artist, so naturally, I wanted to encourage him. He loves it, and I liked the kit so much, I ordered one for myself to replenish my supplies and have a handy carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: Anne M. Short

customer_reviews.title: US Art Supply Kit
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set. But, I found it for a lot less, with the same or better features.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: A good amount of supplies for the money
customer_reviews.text: I came with more than I thought it would I did think the sketch has would be a little bigger but they will work
customer_reviews.author: Denise Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for a doodler and even an artist
customer_reviews.text: The arrangement was very well thought out, i am by no means an artist but sometime like to doodle when i am bored, this kit has everything to keep you entertained, it has a wide variety of equipment in it so there really isnt anything else you need unless it is to replace a well used item
customer_reviews.author: Bob B.

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: this art kit is amazing for a beginger a little of everything a great way to decide what kinda art you would like to advance in or just to create my grand daughter loved it
customer_reviews.author: selma lynn caskey

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an art kit for my granddaughters Christmas gift with a carrying handle as your add describes, and also the box the set came in also says “suitcase handle .” This was especially important for a Her to transport her art kit. Very disappointed. No handle.k
customer_reviews.author: Lois Swenson

customer_reviews.title: Wow, is all my grandson could say when he opened it.
customer_reviews.text: This assortment is great, my grandson's eyes got huge when he opened this box, and the case is really nice also.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and company
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome art kit. It came with everything you could want to get a good start. I bought this for my granddaughter and she couldn't be more pleased with it.

customer_reviews.title: Great serious beginners art set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my 10 year old niece who has real talent in drawing. It gave her all of the important tools she needs to start developing her skills. along with some "how to" books from her parents, she was super happy for Christmas.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the grands busy and they all love it.will order this again

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: It's such a great and comprehensive set, everything you'd need to get started in a very practical case.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Some of my crayons were broken . But other wise great

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product I know my step daughter will love it!! Package was great, delivery right on time!

customer_reviews.title: For the creative mind
customer_reviews.text: Amassing quantity of items at a great quality for an even better price. My daughter was very pleased and excited to get creating!

customer_reviews.title: Need Better Packaging
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my daughters birthday. When we got it, the wooden case was all cracked and broken. Had to send it back. Definitely needs better packaging for the super thin wood. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Boykin

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my sister who used to love art. She was going through a rough time in her life so I was hoping this might help get her back into one of her former hobbies. She lit up when she opened it and has told me every Christmas since then how much she loved this.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: More for your money
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this set for my grad daughter Great gift Highly recimended
customer_reviews.author: CANDY

customer_reviews.title: So lovely.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my art loving niece and she absolutely loves it. It's stunning and the perfect gift for a young artist.
customer_reviews.author: RLW

customer_reviews.title: Packaging needs a re-think
customer_reviews.text: The item was very good except for the crayon level in the drawer. These crayons need to be fastened in place. All the crayons in my set were loose and hard to get out of the drawer as they were piled up. None were where they should have been in their slots. It took me a while to shake them loose but there was no damage.
customer_reviews.author: Winnie

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed. Good for a gift to those who enjoy art and great for your own artistic projects. Wonderful packaged set at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Jefferson

customer_reviews.title: Great for the hobbyist
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for a gift to my young grandson but the set was nicer than expected he received a different one

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this he usese it all the time, it has everything he needs. Only issue is the drawer sticks and the crayons end up everywhere if your not careful

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My girls loved them! They recieved them as Christmas gifts
customer_reviews.author: Sheilah Belin-jones

customer_reviews.title: Nice boxed collection of art supplies.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice collection of art supplies. I bought this as a gift to our granddaughter. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah King

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My niece who’s is 5 and in kindergarten LOVED this for her Christmas present!
customer_reviews.author: Kaaristi

customer_reviews.title: broken
customer_reviews.text: The last thing I expected was the wooden case fell apart when opening it. Junk and over priced .
customer_reviews.author: Dean Ivester

customer_reviews.title: This kit has an excellent quality supplies for anyone to be creative!
customer_reviews.text: These art kits are a remarkable price and the quality is good. I bought four of these and gave them as Christmas gifts to my four Grandchildren. I’m always trying to encourage them to use their God given talents and create beautiful artwork 🖼.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Schultz

customer_reviews.title: I loved the box and the idea of the gift but ...
customer_reviews.text: When I got the items the crayons were everywhere and some of them broke. I loved the box and the idea of the gift but the bottom of the box seemed to be broken and it was hard to open and close the bottom drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Naïka Michel

customer_reviews.title: I’m disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Notebook damaged and cheap crayons, wish it was America made . Not worth the price I had to pay...
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Amazing color palette
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect gift for a beginner, my niece love this one, she adores the whole thing. Super good and easy to use.

customer_reviews.title: Hugh art kit, perfect gift, have lots of options for your little artist!
customer_reviews.text: Best I’ve seen so far for kids, the box is built nice & sturdy. I like all the extra’s. Awesome gift for kids that love to draw & paint.

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my daughter and she loved it. The colors were made with a cheap material, but other than that everything else is nice. I do recommend it.

customer_reviews.title: Gives online ordering a bad name.
customer_reviews.text: I opted to spend more money for the 162 pc. art kit. It is so cheap I will not give as a gift. The bottom drawer was almost impossible to get out because the crayons were broken and stuck and this will happen each time you pick it up.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Morris

customer_reviews.title: Great for any age
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son who loves to draw. I was extremely surprised with the quality of each piece. His art skills have come a long way just learning to use each piece

customer_reviews.text: A lot of tools to make your next masterpiece, this is nice for people who use multiple coloring methods.

customer_reviews.title: messed up crayons on arrival
customer_reviews.text: When I opened it the crayons were in total disarray and it was hard to get them organized again. I was not happy about that. I have to test whether that will happen again as it is moved around, .

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful gift, I can't wait to give it to my grandson for Christmas. He loves to draw and this will be perfect. He asked for a drawing and art kit and this seems to really fill the bill. I am really impressed

customer_reviews.title: she loved it. It’s a nice set

customer_reviews.text: The wooden case is flimsy and broke. All of the screws that was holding the wood fell off. Glue inside to hold the content failed. But all of the content works fine.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Was very disappointed box was smaller then expected. Box seemed to be unfinished and bottom draw was broke amd jammed due to crayons not being in slots. Crayons were broken
